last_episode_to_air.name: The Masterplan
last_episode_to_air.overview: The terrorist cell is exposed and the final tragic details surrounding the attack on Café 66 are revealed. The fallout from these catastrophic events and revelations that follow change the lives of all those involved forever.

name: Informer
overview: Raza, a young second-generation British-Pakistani man from London is coerced by Gabe, a counterterrorism officer, into informing.

episodes.name: No Sleep Till Brooklyn
episodes.overview: A night out with his girlfriend goes badly wrong when Raza Shar is arrested and identified as a potential informant for London's Counter Terrorism Special Unit (CTSU). Detective Sergeant Gabe Waters is partnered with new recruit DC Holly Morgan.

episodes.name: Strawberry Fields
episodes.overview: Gabe needs Raza to get closer to Dadir, the brother of Yousef, his missing informant. A nervous Raza struggles with his new role as he befriends and spends time with the unpredictable Dadir and his Bridge Town Crew.

episodes.name: Charlie Don't Surf
episodes.overview: The toll of Raza’s double life begins to weigh heavily on him, but he finds a crucial new lead. Gabe runs into a ghost from his past and his behaviour piques Holly's interest.

episodes.name: Ruby Tuesday
episodes.overview:
CTSU mount a surveillance operation on their ‘Big Shot’ with Raza at its heart. Gabe visits a contact from his undercover days. Dadir drags

Raza deeper into danger.

episodes.name: November Has Come
episodes.overview: Holly’s curiosity reveals the truth about Gabe’s undercover past and her probing leads to his two worlds colliding. A new lead for CTSU puts Raza directly in the line of fire.

episodes.name: The Masterplan
episodes.overview: The terrorist cell is exposed and the final tragic details surrounding the attack on Café 66 are revealed. The fallout from these catastrophic events and revelations that follow change the lives of all those involved forever.
